when_to_say: Used when introducing or identifying someone or something.
example: ما اسمك؟ (ma ismuka?) - What is your name?

when_to_say: Used to refer to a book or written material.
example: أريد شراء كتاب. (uridu shira' kitab.) - I want to buy a book.
هذه طاولة خشبية. (hadhihi tawila khashabiyya.) - This is a wooden table.

when_to_say: Used to describe something aesthetically pleasing.
example: هذا منظر جميل. (hatha manzar jamil.) - This is a beautiful view.

when_to_say: Used to refer to an educational institution.
example: المدرسة تبدأ الساعة الثامنة. (al-madrasa tabda' al-sa'ah al-thamina.) - School starts at 8 o'clock.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a writing tool.
example: أحتاج قلم للكتابة. (ahtaj qalam lilkitaba.) - I need a pen to write.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a piece of furniture for sleeping.
example: هذا السرير مريح. (hatha al-sarir murih.) - This bed is comfortable.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a place of residence.
example: المنزل قريب من هنا. (al-manzil qarib min huna.) - The house is close to here.

when_to_say: Used to refer to an opening for light or air.
example: النافذة مفتوحة. (al-nafiza maftuha.) - The window is open.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a piece of furniture for sitting.
example: هذا الكرسي مريح. (hatha al-kursi murih.) - This chair is comfortable.
